attributes.action: request that installers/programmers ensure the accuracy of Satellite Navigation into vehicles are compatible with road networks.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Too often vehicles are directed through communities unnecessarily, often through the highway they would normally be excluded, due to either weight or width restrictions in place. Additionally, they are frequently directed into lanes that go nowhere (dead ends). In any event, this often frustrates communities as a result of the disruption caused, and of course the delays motorists can incur
